thread.title: 500 or More Fashion Wigs in One Place, Online Fashion Wig..
thread.title_full: 500 or More Fashion Wigs in One Place, Online Fashion Wig..

author: Gabalnara
title: 500 or More Fashion Wigs in One Place, Online Fashion Wig..
text:
SEOUL, South Korea , Oct.   A Korean online shopping mall is building reputation as the shop   carries a variety of fashion wigs matching all kinds of customer demands. It goes by the name, 'Gabalnara ' ( www.gabalnara.com) , the online shopping mall for fashion wigs. The shop releases 2 - 3 new products every week, and currently offers fashion wigs of approximately 500 different styles and colors. Notably, all products of Gabalnara are manufactured in South Korea which has been traditionally known for high quality wigs. The shop is continuously receiving calls from TV celebrities asking for sponsorship as it is known to be the first place to find wigs reflecting the latest fashion trends around the world.
"We carry wigs of brilliant colors, from blonde wigs that American and European customers prefer to wigs that have been popular in each country in each period," said president Kim Deok -hyeon of Gabalnara, "In 2014, we prepared the English website ( en.gabalnara.com ) through Korea's largest e-commerce solution brand cafe24 ( www.cafe24.com ) and have had customers around the world purchasing our products since then." 
Especially, the online shopping mall of Gabalnara provides product descriptions and summaries in connection with the translation service provided by online portal sites frequently used by customers to help the purchase. In the future, the site is going to create categories by major countries to help see all the different existing hairstyle trends. 
"Fashion wig is as useful as a hat and easy to change the style," said Kim, "We are going to expand the market for fashion wigs by increasing our sales channels, such as selling on famous open markets around the world." 

SOURCE Gabalnara
